Description.en:
[Description]
This project is the sample programs driving a permanent magnetic synchronous motor in the 120-degree conducting method using the RL78/G24 microcontroller.
The Current detection method is 1-shunt mode that detects DC link current.
[Features, Target System]
-Sensorless feedback
-Hall sensor feedback
-120-degree conducting control
-1-shunt current detection method
[Hardware Setup]
-CPU card : RL78/G24(R7F101GLG2DFB) CPU card (RTK0EMG240C00000BJ)
-Inverter board : LVI400 (RTK0EMGPLVB00000BJ)
-Communication board : MC-COM
-Permanent magnet synchronous motor : TG-55L
[Supported QE function(s)]
-Analyzer
[Document Number]
R01AN7386EJ0100

RL78/G24マイクロコントローラを使用し、永久磁石同期モータを120度通電方式で駆動するサンプルプログラムです。
電流検出方式はDCリンク電流を検出する1シャントモードです。
[機能、対象システム]

-通信ボード : MC-COM
